entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character in the story, a Gryffindor student who is injured and recovering in the hospital wing. (Excerpt: 'Filthy and soaking wet, the rest of the Gryffindor team had arrived to see Harry.')

entities.name: george
entities.description: A member of the Gryffindor team who praises Harry's flying skills. (Excerpt: ‘Unbelievable flying, Harry,’ said George.)

entities.name: marcus flint
entities.description: A person who is yelling at Malfoy about having the Snitch on top of his head. (Excerpt: 'Something about having the Snitch on top of his head and not noticing.')

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: A person who is being yelled at by Marcus Flint for having the Snitch on top of his head. (Excerpt: 'Something about having the Snitch on top of his head and not noticing.')

entities.name: madam pomfrey
entities.description: A nurse who is taking care of Harry in the hospital wing and orders him to rest. (Excerpt: 'This boy needs rest, he’s got thirty-three bones to regrow! Out! OUT!’)

entities.name: gryffindor team
entities.description: A group of students from Gryffindor house who arrive at the hospital wing to visit Harry. (Excerpt: 'Filthy and soaking wet, the rest of the Gryffindor team had arrived to see Harry.')

entities.name: snitch
entities.description: An object that is on top of Malfoy's head, causing Marcus Flint to yell at him. (Excerpt: 'Something about having the Snitch on top of his head and not noticing.')
